entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 13 December 2018

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 13 December 2018

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
